# The `ExitLimit` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Information about the number of loop iterations for which a loop exit&#39;s branch condition evaluates to the not-taken path. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

Information about the number of loop iterations for which a loop exit&#39;s branch condition evaluates to the not-taken path.

This is a temporary pair of exact and max expressions that are eventually summarized in ExitNotTakenInfo and BackedgeTakenInfo.

Definition at line 1117 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.

## Public Constructors

### ExitLimit() {#a1e319052f7cf5f2d9769db4ed04694ce}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ScalarEvolution::ExitLimit::ExitLimit (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42; E)</>}>
Construct either an exact exit limit from a constant, or an unknown one from a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scevcouldnotcompute">SCEVCouldNotCompute</a>.

No other types of SCEVs are allowed as arguments and asserts enforce that internally.

### Predicates {#a55c32d22214d7bbfc6c7c6271b5e7038}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;const SCEVPredicate &#42;, 4&gt; llvm::ScalarEvolution::ExitLimit::Predicates</>}>
A vector of predicate guards for this <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scalarevolution/exitlimit">ExitLimit</a>.

The result is only valid if all of the predicates in <code>Predicates</code> evaluate to &#39;true&#39; at run-time.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h/#l01129">1129</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/scalarevolution-h">ScalarEvolution.h</a>.
